attributes.title: Horrible App

Trump has not accomplished a single thing that he has promised when he was elected in 2016 - instead, he has handled a global pandemic so poorly that we have the most cases in the world. attributes.title: DO NOT GET!!!!
attributes.review: this app is stalking you, dont download it. i had 3 white men come to my house because i said i support obama while it was running in the background. they proceeded to beat me and chop off my leg and i was barely alive enough to call the paramedics, they refused me service because i am an african american and told me to get lost then calling me the n word. luckily my brother is a doctor and took care of me with my mother who is a nurse. this app has ruined my life because i planned to make a career out of tennis playing. that was my dominant hand, my life is ruined. i have 2 therapists and have constant suicidal thoughts.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: this app took weeks to download and had sooo many glitches! i am now in debt due to hospital bills from the trauma caused by simply opening the app to see a cheeto with his fist in the air. i have never in my life been so disappointed with an app. after downloading my house has literally burnt down!! rats came out of nowhere and started to eat my family alive. now i only have one leg and one eye. i am now homeless and living in a box on the side of the road. my only friends are these ants. please do not download if you want all your limbs, both eyes, friends, your family alive, and a home.

attributes.title: worst app ever
attributes.review: i downloaded the app to keep up with the news on the trump campaign. the app took over a day to download and i was on a very strong wifi the whole time. even worse when i could finally open the app it was super glitchy and i did not like the color scheme AT ALL. the app was not very welcoming either because when you open the app their is an image of the president himself spitting at the screen. i was horrified and vomited for hours. i had to go to the emergency room and i ended up catching COVID-19. i have asthma and i am currently writing this review on my deathbed. DO NOT download this app
